title: LF Diamond 3+ Players to form a team (2017 OOL)
body:
Hey guys,
I have previously managed a few OOL teams and are looking to start up a new one from scratch.
Requirements:
- Diamond 3+
- Goal to reach OCS
- Flexible availability for scrims
- The will to listen and learn
-  Non-Toxic

If interested add me and message me.
IGN: Hi Im DaeDae

replies.body: I'm up for it. I fill out all the requirements bar Diamond 3+, but if it matters I managed to actually hit D3 and my mechanics are deceptively above my shown skill level.
Heya mate, i'm a diamond 5 support main and I know I dont fit the role of diamond 3 + but like, it's hard lol Anyway i'd like to hear from ya.
Not diamond 3 YET. BUT REACH PLAT V with 200 ping in korean server does that count?
